sentences.sentence: "I think," she said, "it is perfectly lovely the way you talk about girls; John there just despises us."
sentences.translation: “我认为，”她说，“你谈论女孩子的方式非常可爱；约翰就总是看不起我们。”

sentences.sentence: He whose walk is upright fears the Lord, but he whose ways are devious despises him.
sentences.translation: 行动正直的，敬畏耶和华；行事乖僻的，却藐视他。
